snippet: If the Nov. 8 vote is credible, most observers believe that Daw Aung San Suu Kyi’s party, the National League for Democracy, will win the most seats in Parliament.
abstract: Opposition leader Daw Aung San Suu Kyi announces intention to lead country sub rosa, evading constitutional prohibition on her being president, if her National League for Democracy wins next election.
lead_paragraph: If the Nov. 8 vote is credible, most observers believe that Daw Aung San Suu Kyi’s party, the National League for Democracy, will win the most seats in Parliament.
